statement.p: Yellow light has a wavelength of 580 nanometers. Note a nanometer is \displaystyle{1}\times{10}^{{-{9}}} of a meter. The speed of light is \displaystyle{3}\times{10}^{{8}} meters/second. What is the frequency in Hertz?

p.em: Enter your answer in scientific notation with three significant figures. For example: 3.29E13 or 4.29E-12.
